#sent_text:A new opera has been produced here, entitled Temistocle, from the pen of Paccini.
#sent_text:The soio vocalists were Mrs. Bridge, Miss Pocklington, Miss E. Taylor, Mrs. Littlehales, the Rev. G. C. Robinson, and Mr. Fieid, all of whom were highly successful.
#sent_text:It is somewhat singular, that we find a passage exactly similar to one in Haydn’ s beautiful canzonet,
#sent_text:The drama of Ciro riconosciuto was the production also of this year.
#sent_text:Some reproaches are addressed to him relative to his melodies, as well as different observations, which interest us no more than Some reproaches did Rossini himself.
#sent_text:The padre illustrates these rules by lumi« nous examples of the alterations of old melodies, and a table containing Tutte le Intonazioni dei Salmi.

#sent_text:Surely, then, the comparative share of Madame Pasta was not exorbitant, her comparative merit being considered ; though, as I have before hinted, the positive sum, three hundred guineas, was at least double what would have been an ample compensation.

#sent_text:The words are as simple as the melody, which however i is richly embellished by an arpeggio accompaniment, so varied as to de- mionstrate the fine taste of Mr. Bishop in such accompaniments.
#sent_text:Ermione was written for St. Carlo in the same style ; but this opera produced but little effect.
#sent_text:He published some years afterwards “ Nouvelle Methode de Violon, et de Musigue.
